[Taiwan](/wiki/Buddhism_in_Taiwan) - [Thailand](/wiki/Buddhism_in_Thailand) - [Tibet](/wiki/Tibetan_Buddhism) - [Vietnam](/wiki/Buddhism_in_Vietnam) - Buddhism portal - v - t - e **Drigar Thubten Dargye Ling** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 直噶如灯大吉林中心), is a [Buddhist](/wiki/Buddhist) center in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). The foundation was originally set up by Guru [Garchen Rinpoche](/wiki/Garchen_Rinpoche). The present premises are located at [Geylang](/wiki/Geylang), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## Overview **Drigar Thubten Dargye Ling** was founded in 2007 by [Garchen Rinpoche](/wiki/Garchen_Rinpoche).
